name: Phantasmal Hearts
description:
"Phantasmal Hearts" is a captivating visual novel that follows the story of Ava, a young woman with an unusual gift that she struggles to understand. Ava has the ability to see people's emotions and intentions, but the more she uses her power, the more she realizes that it comes with a heavy price.

As Ava begins to explore her paranormal abilities, she becomes involved in a series of mysterious events that lead her down a dangerous path. Along the way, she meets a cast of intriguing characters, each with their own secrets and hidden agendas.

As the plot unfolds, Ava must navigate the challenges of her newfound powers and the consequences that come with them. Will she be able to use her gift for good, or will it lead to her downfall?

With its stunning artwork and captivating storyline, "Phantasmal Hearts" is a visual novel that will keep you on the edge of your seat from beginning to end. Experience the thrill of the supernatural as you join Ava on her journey of discovery and self-discovery
